english: What a miserable old devil scrooge was !
chinese: 斯克鲁奇是多么可恶的老鬼啊！

english: The circulation of gossip is abhorrent .
chinese: 传播流言蜚语是可恶的。

english: A foul enchantress turned me into a frog .
chinese: 一个可恶的女巫把我变成了一只青蛙。
你替一个可恶的政权效劳。
可恶的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The author portrayed his father as a vicious drunkard .
chinese: 作者把他父亲描绘成一个可恶的酒鬼。

english: You are very naughty to dare to repeat what he says .
chinese: 你竟敢重复他所说的话，这是非常可恶的。

english: She wouldn't have borne your abominable behaviour quietly .
chinese: 她才不会安静地忍受你那可恶的作风。

english: They had been making abominable light of her during supper .
chinese: 他们在吃晚饭的时候，对她做了一些可恶的影射。

english: Something in the tone of his voice seemed to add "that bloody fool" .
chinese: 他的话声中似乎有这样的意思：“那个可恶的大傻瓜。”

english: Convenience is, however, in all affairs of life, an execrable test of value .
chinese: 然而在生活事务各方面，投合是可恶的实用准则。

english: Convenience is , however , in all affairs of life an execrable test of value .
chinese: 然而在生活事务的各方面，利益是可恶的价值准则。

english: The accursed shark alone can in any generic respect be said to bear comparative analogy to the dog .
chinese: 就一般情况说来，只有那种可恶的鲨鱼，才可以说是具有跟狗相似的癖性。

english: She quivered with indignation at the account of the conduct of the miserable rawdon and the unprincipled steyne .
chinese: 她听到可恶的罗登和无耻的斯丹恩干这种坏事，气得周身发抖。
